name: Cavern Crawling - Search for the Golden Bat
name_original: Cavern Crawling - Search for the Golden Bat
description:
Made for a Scratch Game Jam

I work in Unity primarily, but I'm currently using scratch to teach children, so I thought this would be fun (it was, loooaaads of fun).

You can check out the game's Scratch page and the code here: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/550299556/

You miiiight need to refresh the page of the game doesn't load

Most of the art and all of the sound is taken from the scratch library, the remainder being made with the scratch sprite/backdrop editor
